TopicTitle: MER (Munar Electric Rover)-dockable with most modular surface bases! 7 Kerbal

Articles.Content:
I was building my Munabse when i realised i had no rover for the crew to travel around with.

It had to be able to carry equipment and people, and the MER wa born!

Early tests on Kerbin:

Later I launched it to my Munabse where it successfully berthed with the complex:

It is still beta since it handles horribly.

It can seat 7 kerbals and has 2 jr docking ports to place equipment/probes on.

It also has 2 standard ports on the sides to dock with bases like Temstar's surface base kit bases.

Download will be available soon.....

Edited December 12, 2013 by iDan122

I just realized.... I have yet to make a rover :l

Very cool, by the way.
Now make a fuel tanker. (Use the Orange tank and the BIG RCS tank)
Correction. Now make a fuel tanker that rolls on landing gear that has little arms on the front with jr docking ports at the bottom so your rover can tow it around tractor-trailer style.
Temstar already made a fuel tanker. He had everything in his base kit except for a manned rover

Bad news guys my laptop just broke down for some reason and I didn't do a backup of my save n ages(last one was like 2 months ago) and I didn't upload the MER anywhere yet!

I hope I can get it working, if not, I'll try to salvage the files from the HDD
